name: seastreak.jpg
alt: A view of the wake from the Seastreak ferry, with a metal box in the foreground labeled "40 ADULT LIFE JACKETS"
cap: Abord the Seastreak Ferry from Wall Street/Pier 11 to Atlantic Highlands, NJ. Summer 2019.

name: bbridge.jpg
alt: A view looking southbound of the Manhattan Bridge from the East River, with the Brooklyn Bridge in the background and light streaming through the cables.
cap: The Manhattan Bridge from the Seastreak ferry. Summer 2019.

name: lake-bled.jpg
alt: Looking down at Lake Bled in Solvenia. A small island with a tower sits in the middle of the lake.
cap: Looking down on Lake Bled, Slovenia. Summer 2019.

name: triglav.jpg
alt: A woman in sunglasses with her hands in pockets stands on a trail in front of trees and rocky mountains.
cap: Madeline on the trail in Triglav National Park, Slovenia. Summer 2019.
